data.message: Where did D12 go??? What happened to all this " homies for life" bullshit eminem used to spit on every single D12 song ever??? Seems eminem has got a new crew and those life long home boys have been pushed away. Seems to be me has no real love for his crews,

replies.message: Basically after proof died he gave up on d12 so bizarre, kuniva, and swifty have found success in the underground while eminem is making millions for selling out to mainstream
Eminem is still with d12 better belive that but em is moving the powerhouse slaughthoues team steamrolling these groups like mmg and yung money.
